input.sentences: outside the museum | the director had to post a sign due to the number of people that continued to pick the flowers there .
often | the grass would grow so long that the sign seemed hidden in comparison to the large museum building .
sometimes the sign would be placed next to the trees as well | for they also flowered .
more often than not | the sign still stood even when the flowers were not budding or in season .
even in the fall the sign was there to warn patrons to respect the museum grounds and the plans that grew there .
